additionalProperties.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text â€” the value must parse with JSON.parse().

^x-[\\w\\d\\.\\x2d_]+$.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

anyOf.description: A hint to the client to identify how the bearer token is formatted.
A short description for security scheme.

scheme.description: The name of the HTTP Authorization scheme to be used in the Authorization header as defined in RFC7235.

type.description: The type of the security scheme.
